amendment.description: To prohibit the use of funds in a manner that benefits citizens or businesses of France and Germany unless physically located in the United States.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 488 withdrawn in Senate.

Amendment SA 488 proposed by Senator Ensign. (consideration: CR S4752-4755, S4759-4760, S4762; text: CR S4752) To prohibit the use of funds in a manner that benefits citizens or businesses of France and Germany unless physically located in the United States.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 488 proposed by Senator Ensign.
